meanings.definition: To bring or transport something to a destination.
meanings.sent1: The mail carrier is delivering letters to our house.
meanings.sent2: The pizza delivery person is delivering food to our doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The stork is delivering a special package to a family.
meanings.sent4: The wind is delivering the scent of flowers from the garden.
meanings.sent5: The truck is delivering a load of supplies to the construction site.

meanings.definition: To give birth to a baby.
meanings.sent1: The doctor is delivering a baby in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The mother is delivering her baby at home with a midwife.
meanings.sent3: The stork jokester claims he is delivering babies to families.
meanings.sent4: The earth is delivering new life in the form of a baby bird hatching.
meanings.sent5: The tree is delivering a new leaf into the world.

meanings.sent1: The store is delivering groceries to our doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The company is delivering a presentation to the clients.
meanings.sent3: The magician claims he can deliver endless amounts of rabbits from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun is delivering warmth to the earth on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The cloud is delivering rain to the thirsty plants.

meanings.definition: To hand over or transfer something to someone.
meanings.sent1: The courier is delivering an important package to the office.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer is delivering the legal documents to the court.
meanings.sent3: The pirate is delivering a treasure map to the unsuspecting crew.
meanings.sent4: The key is delivering access to the locked room.
meanings.sent5: The handshake is delivering trust between the two individuals.

meanings.definition: To rescue or save someone from harm.
meanings.sent1: The lifeguard is delivering a swimmer from drowning in the pool.
meanings.sent2: The superhero is delivering the city from the villain's evil plans.
meanings.sent3: The cat is delivering the mouse from the claws of the hungry owl.
meanings.sent4: The umbrella is delivering protection from the rain.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter is delivering people from the burning building.
